question: 中学校
sourceMnemonic:
You know that <ja>学校</ja> means school. So, people who are in the <kanji>middle</kanji> <kanji>school</kanji> are in... wait for it... <vocabulary>middle school</vocabulary>. 

And, of course, if you're one of those people that call it <vocabulary>junior high school</vocabulary> you can do that too.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is a combination of <ja>学校</ja> and <ja>中</ja>. Really, it's all on'yomi too, so you should be able to read this one. Take note of the <ja>がく</ja> turning to <ja>がっ</ja>, though.
